lexUnit.name: bomb.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: attack with a bomb or bombs.

sentence.text: THE United States yesterday alleged that planes that bombed targets in eastern Bosnia last weekend flagrantly violated a UN no-fly zone and said two Americans are part of a UN team located near the target area .
